thread.title: Brazil's Rousseff says government wants to avoid budget deficit
thread.title_full: Brazil's Rousseff says government wants to avoid budget deficit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Brazil's Rousseff says government wants to avoid budget deficit
text: SAO PAULO, Sept 4 Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff said in a radio interview broadcast on Friday that the government wants to avoid a budget deficit and that it will discuss measures to raise needed revenue toward that end. (Reporting by Pedro Fonseca; Writing by Brad Haynes and Reese Ewing)
